original_title: Meth & Red: How to Throw a Party at the Playboy Mansion
overview: Everyone knows that Hef's the original playa. But when hip-hop multi-platinum megastars Redman and Method Man decide to jump the Playboy Mansion fence to throw a hot bootleg party for themselves and a few hundred of their closest friends, it's an outrageous never-before-seen look into Hef's world. The Dynamic Duo, Funk Doc and Mr. Meth explore the mansion grounds, referee a skins vs. skins tennis match, hot box chronic in the sauna, get down in the grotto, and instigate a Jell-O wrestling tournament between some of the ladies at the ultimate Playboy Mansion party. Watch old school meet new school in this freaky-deaky comedy! Hef's crib has never seen a party like this - and neither have you!
title: Meth & Red: How to Throw a Party at the Playboy Mansion
